ac.ucy.cs.spdx.graph

Class LicenseGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.ucy.cs.spdx.graph.LicenseGraph

  • public class LicenseGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    This is License Graph class. It is a simple implementation of SimpleDirectedGraph from jgrapht library. It consists of several methods of traversing, creating and editing the licenseGrapht of LicenseUtils class.
    Author:
    dpasch01

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleDirectedGraph<LicenseNode,LicenseEdge> licenseGraph

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addLicense(java.lang.String url)
      Finds the License base on the url passed as parameter and adds it in the license Graph.
      static void addLicense(java.lang.String identifier, java.lang.String license, java.io.File licenseText)
      Creates a new License base identifier,license name and Text File passed as parameter and adds it in the license Graph.
      static void addLicenseNode(boolean nonTransitivity, java.lang.String nodeIdentifier, java.lang.String... licenseIdentifiers)
      Creates a new License Node with the Licenses passed as parameter and defines whether or not is transitive.
      static void connectNode(boolean nonClosure, java.lang.String nodeIdentifier, java.lang.String... nodeIdentifiers)
      Connects the License Node passed as parameter with the other Nodes also passed as parameters by creating new edge between them and defining whether or not is transitive
      static org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleDirectedGraph<LicenseNode,LicenseEdge> createLicenseGraph()
      Returns the initialization state of the license graph.
      static void printGraph()
      Prints the license Graph.
